description: Never spend another minute trying to find a single screw on the floor of your server room. With our server cabinet shelves, everything is neatly organized and laid out in front of you so that you can get back to work quickly. The 1U and 2U are designed specifically for 19" servers, cabinets components, and rack mounts which means they're easy to install without reducing any space in your server room. With so many different types of server rack cabinets and enclosures, it is important for the data center manager to find a solution that fits their needs. We have designed our shelves with this in mind by making them able to fit any model from top brands like APC, Dell, or Lenovo. Our shelving will help you optimize your space while staying organized with whatever type of cabinet system best suits your organization's needs! 1U and 2U Server Racks & Cabinet Shelves are made for use in wide racks or mountable storage Their server cabinet shelves are designed to fit any wide rack or enclosure. This will help you organize and optimize your space while being able to get the most out of it so that your time is well spent on other things!
name: Server Cabinet Shelves
